positions.title: Strategy & Growth Consultant & Advisor - Fashion, Beauty, E-Commerce, DTC & Startups
positions.description:
Strategy, growth & commercial consultant to CEOs, boards, PE investors & start-ups. Project successes include:
-In The Style: Completed growth strategy / GTM project working closely with CEO & board following PE acquisition. £100m IPO completed 9 months later. Chair feedback: “Your help at ITS was invaluable and is still talked about!”
-Rianta Capital: Investment appraisals, commercial DD & strategy review for target fashion & retail investments
-Luxury Fashion Scale-Up: Strategic advisor to CEO & COO for successful $7m pre-series A fundraise  
-Beauty Start-Up: Supported start-up beauty founder with fundraising strategy & financial modelling, culminating in successful appearance on Dragon’s Den receiving three Dragon offers

positions.title: Founder & CEO (Exited: Trade Acquisition)
positions.description:
Kair is a premium laundry brand disrupting and elevating the £2bn UK laundry category by focussing on clothing care, scent and innovation in route-to-market through fashion partnerships.  Notable achievements:

Fundraising / Exit
- Raised £1.1m in oversubscribed pre-seed VC financing from two leading consumer funds & >20 angel investors, against a backdrop of less than 2% of VC money being allocated to female founding teams
- Trade sale completed early 2024 to Furniture Clinic

Brand & Product Development
-Developed the UK’s first luxury laundry brand from scratch, establishing a clear positioning in the fashion world to build partnerships with premium brands
- Owned end-to-end product development across the full supply chain, from formulation to packaging, achieving exceptionally high customer retention & LTV 

Marketing & Partnerships
-Achieved top-tier press coverage including. HIGHSNOBIETY, Vogue, & BOF
-Achieved retail listings with luxury department stores including Liberty and Brown Thomas and partnerships with leading contemporary fashion brands including The Fold and Kitri

positions.title: Chief Business Officer
positions.description:
Rixo is a privately held, hyper-growth women’s contemporary fashion brand.  I joined as the brand’s first C-level hire alongside creative founders, tasked with developing the strategic direction and growth plan for the business, implementing the operational infrastructure (both team and technology) to ready the business for scale and held ultimate responsibility for delivering profitable growth.

Strategic Planning & Finance
-Led the organisation's strategic plan in close collaboration with founders and leadership team
-Implemented structured goal setting and communication of strategy to teams. Introduced KPIs & OKRs at company, team & individual level, and weekly/quarterly full team meetings & performance updates
-Led finance & planning functions; personally owning financial model build & development before finance director recruited

Team Development & Organisational Design
-Codified unique culture and owned organisational design, adding growth-focussed headcount. -Introduced structured recruitment process, creating foundation for scaling team from 15 to 35 in nine months
-Directly recruited key senior leaders (inc. high calibre Finance Director, E-Commerce Director & Business Analytics Lead) in a competitive market
-External feedback: “What’s the magic behind your hiring?  Every single person is incredible; there’s a special energy here”

Operations & Technology
-Implemented operational technology infrastructure to facilitate scaling to £100m+ revenue 
-Led three systems selections & implementations: ERP (Netsuite); data analytics & BI platform (Looker, Big Query, Snowflake), e-commerce replatform (Shopify Plus)

Marketing & Growth
-Accelerated DTC growth in international markets (particularly USA) by pivoting digital marketing & e-commerce activity to being customer & data-driven. 
-Launched pioneering shop-from-catwalk collection, shown at September 2019 LFW

allData.headline: CEO || COO || Strategic Advisor || Investor || Fashion, Beauty & Luxury Retail || ex-Glossier, Google, Net-a-Porter, innocent
allData.summary:
A vibrant, data-driven and commercially astute leader with 18 years’ experience building and scaling pioneering, digital-first fashion, luxury & beauty brands. Before taking on full PnL leadership roles, my functional experience spanned a rare combination of commercial finance, digital marketing & strategic insight. This shapes an operating mindset that is uniquely growth-oriented whilst fiscally sustainable. 

I’m known for leveraging data to unlock untapped commercial potential and identify the most effective go-to-market strategy; propelling digital growth and effectively articulating and guiding the path to scale.  Notably, I've thrived in entrepreneurial environments and roles, having led newly established, commercially-focused teams at Google and Net-a-Porter, and taken growth-focussed commercial leadership roles at emerging brands like Glossier and Rixo.

Having played a pivotal part in shaping the trajectory of some of the category-defining brands of the last 15 years, and operated in high growth businesses of all sizes from start-up to $1bn+, I’m well placed to offer commercial & strategic guidance for founding teams & investors alike, guiding the journey from £5-20m to £100m and beyond.  

Beyond my operating roles, since 2020 I have also become an active investor and start-up advisor, with particular interest in the technology-enabled consumer sector and the creator economy.  


Key Skills
-C-level leadership and full PnL accountability in high-growth fashion, beauty, luxury, and consumer brands
-Building and leading commercially-oriented teams of up to 70+ across multiple geographies: organisational design, talent planning, recruiting, coaching and mentoring
-Translating business and customer insights into clearly defined and articulately communicated, data-driven strategy
-Proven track record in accelerating digital revenue growth and managing budgets of £20m+ effectively
-Extensive experience in digital marketing, e-commerce, and technology infrastructure implementation
-Chartered Management Accountant (CIMA); exceptionally numerate & highly experienced building complex, full business financial & forecasting models
-Fundraising, as a both a founder and consultant from Pre-Seed through Series A
-Implementing end-to-end technology and operational infrastructure necessary to facilitate scale
-Entrepreneurial remits and navigating uncertainty and ambiguity in fast-paced, start-up and scale-up environments
